svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Solar PV energy consumption, terawatt-hours per year
Total solar photovoltaic (PV) energy consumption by country or region, measured in terawatt-hours (TWh) per year.
Source: BP Statistical Review of Global Energy
